channel.title: GitHub Trending - TypeScript (Monthly)
channel.description: Repository più popolari su GitHub in TypeScript nel periodo monthly

item.title: 🟦 bytedance/deer-flow (8280 ⭐)
item.description:
👤 Owner: bytedance

📝 Repository: bytedance/deer-flow

📄 Descrizione: DeerFlow is a community-driven framework for deep research, combining language models with tools like web search, crawling, and Python execution, while contributing back to the open-source community.

⭐ Stelle: 8280

🍴 Forks: 726

💻 Linguaggio: TypeScript

🏷️ Topics: agent agentic agentic-framework agentic-workflow ai ai-agents bytedance deep-research langchain langgraph langmanus llm multi-agent nodejs podcast python typescript
